timeline.bodyText: It seems this user is never removed. You can use Creator.create(RealmResource, UserRepresentation) that handles cleanup automatically, see e.g. https://github.com/keycloak/keycloak/blob/master/testsuite/integration-arquillian/tests/base/src/test/java/org/keycloak/testsuite/adapter/servlet/SAMLServletAdapterTest.java#L924. Feel free to use Creator.create(RealmResource, GroupRepresentation) for group similarly.
